refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the name or oid of the tables field

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
result
&pgsql.parameter.result;
field
Field number, starting from 0.
oid_only
By default the tables name that field belongs to is returned but if oid_only is set to &true;, then the oid will instead be returned.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
On success either the fields table name or oid, &return.falseforfailure;.
